attributes.action: Give police more funding to look for dog fighting gangs. Stop dogs being stolen
attributes.additional_details: There are so many lost pet pages on Facebook, with hundreds of dogs daily going missing, presumed stolen
attributes.background: There are so many dogs nationwide being stolen from their homes, to either be sold on or used as bait for dog fighting. The bait dogs are then dumped as no longer usable, mostly with horrific injuries. They are starved, beaten and abused. These gangs hide in their underground world. FIND THEM

rejection.details:
The Government gives funding to police forces, but it's not responsible for deciding in detail how they spend their money.

If you're concerned about policing in your local area, you could contact your local elected Police and Crime Commissioner (PCC). You can find out who your PCC is, and how to contact them, here:

https://www.police.uk/
